title: Quantity of ice cream consumed in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2008 - 2012 , by age
summary: Overall Consumption in grams has decreased over the Year.
Consumption in grams is slightly decreasing from 11-18_years to 19-64_years.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 11-18_years and 19-64_years.
The highest Consumption in grams, of value 8.0 was reached at Year 11-18_years
The lowest Consumption in grams, of value 5.0 was reported at Year 19-64_years
